Group hierarchy: AWS Pricing Calculator provides only an estimate of your AWS fees and doesn't include any taxes that might apply. Your actual fees depend on a variety of factors, including your actual usage of AWS services.

This time due to the increased budget I increased the specifications of the servers and the database, choosing bigger machines. In addition I made the Databases Multi-AZ again, increasing the resiliency. To have a better performant web application and webservers I also doubled the number of parallel running instanced and chose to use convertible instances for future flexibility
